section.title: PostgreSQL Database Access
section.para: This package offers an &ffi-pac;-based interface to &postgresql-link;.
The package SQL (nicknamed POSTGRES and POSTGRESQL) is case-sensitive, so you would write (sql:PQconnectdb ...) when you need to call PQconnectdb().
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-var; contains the symbol :POSTGRESQL.
section.para: Additionally, some higher level functionality is available:

listitem.simpara: PQfinish the &conn-r; and mark it as invalid
PQclear the &res-r; and mark it as invalid

term.code: (sql:sql-connect &key-amp; host port options tty name login password)

step.simpara: call sql:sql-connect on &option-r;s and bind &var-r; to the result

listitem.simpara: execure the &body-r; on the &res-r; of &command-r;, then sql:pq-clear the &res-r;
the default login argument to sql:sql-connect (initially set to "postgres")
the default password argument to sql:sql-connect (initially set to "postgres")
when non-&nil;, should be a &stream-t;; sql:sql-connect and sql:sql-transaction will write to it (initially set to &nil;)

warning.para: Since PQfinish and PQclear cannot be called on the same pointer twice, one needs to track their validity (sql:sql-connect and sql:sql-transaction take care of that). See .
